SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM BOARD

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE IN
#{item}

SELECT B.BOARD_TYPE ,B.BOARD_NUM ,B.BOARD_TITLE ,B.BOARD_COMMENT ,B.CREATOR ,U.USER_NAME FROM BOARD B JOIN USER_INFO U ON B.CREATOR = U.USER_ID WHERE B.BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType} AND B.BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum}

INSERT INTO BOARD (BOARD_TYPE ,BOARD_NUM ,BOARD_TITLE ,BOARD_COMMENT ,CREATOR ,CREATE_TIME ,MODIFIER ,MODIFIED_TIME ) VALUES (#{boardType} ,NVL((SELECT TO_NUMBER(MAX(BOARD_NUM)+1) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType}),1) ,#{boardTitle} ,#{boardComment} ,#{creator} ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE) ,'SYSTEM' ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE) )
